duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect and design complex electromechanical systems for high-volume consumer products
Mentor and lead a small hardware team, shaping best practices and technical decisions
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to turn visionary concepts into tangible products
Solve challenges by working closely with electrical, R&D, and Software Reliability teams
Utilize expertise in mechanical design, product development, and advanced tools/technologies
Work closely with senior stakeholders and partners to understand business/technical requirements and assist with product road mapping

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Mechanical Engineering from a 4-year accredited university or equivalent experience is required. MS in Mechanical Engineering is preferred.
